column1: Little Goat Diner////Not sure if some of the reviews are expecting Little Goat to be Girl and the Goat but I found this Diner to be amazing. To drink
column3: while is wasn't the best old fashioned I have ever had
column4: it's obvious the bartender is used to making great cocktails. For dinner
column5: I had the "all american burger" while my friend had the mushroom ragu; both tasted amazing. On the side
column6: we also had elotes and while I'm not the biggest fan
column7: the entire plate was gone within 10 minutes. Finally
column9: we had the sprinkle cake (forgot what the actual name of it) and it was a great way to top off a fantastic dinner!
